entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along exposed areas of the coast in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
